# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: make a Python code for a bot in Telegram where there will be two inline buttons and a callback

Відповідь: query

import requests
import json

bot_token = '137775082:XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX'

 # Get the Telegram Bot API url
base_url = 'https://api.telegram.org/bot%s/' % (bot_token)

#Set up inline keyboard
inline_keyboard = json.dumps({
    'inline_keyboard': [
        [
            {
                'text': 'Button 1',
                'callback_data': '1'
            },
            {
                'text': 'Button 2',
                'callback_data': '2'
            }
        ]
    ]
})

#Create a message
message = 'Choose one of the following:'

# Build the http request
url = base_url + 'sendMessage?chat_id=XXX&text=' + message + '&reply_markup=' + inline_keyboard

# send the request
response = requests.get(url)

# Check the response
if response.status_code == 200:
    print("Success")
else:
    print("Failed")
